title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Removed a bullet point about callback requests during Urgent ticket handling.
Added dedicated "About Callback Requests" section with guidelines:
Restricts callbacks to essential live discussions only.
Specifies Support Engineer discretion on call format (phone/screen share).
Clarifies callbacks aren't SLA-bound; response based on priority/availability.
Emphasizes efficiency: calls focus on info gathering and expectations before engineers resume independent troubleshooting.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.

To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed a bullet point about callback requests during Urgent ticket handling.
- Added dedicated "About Callback Requests" section with guidelines:
  - Restricts callbacks to essential live discussions only.
  - Specifies Support Engineer discretion on call format (phone/screen share).
  - Clarifies callbacks aren't SLA-bound; response based on priority/availability.
  - Emphasizes efficiency: calls focus on info gathering and expectations before engineers resume independent troubleshooting.

### Title
Clarify callback request guidelines for GitHub Premium Support
